Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS
REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Relates to limiting certain disclosure of law enforcement disciplinary records
Summary: Requires redaction of unfounded and unsubstantiated allegations in law enforcement disciplinary records.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public officers law, in relation to prohibiting the public disclosure of unsubstantiated or unfounded complaints, allegations and charges made against law enforcement officers
